general_advisory: Apply well decomposed Farm Yard Manure/ vermicompost during last ploughing in the field. Before raising any crop go for collection of soil sample and test it in nearby soil testing laboratory. Apply balanced fertilizers in all the crops as per soil test based recommendations mentioned in the soil health card. Farmers are advised to repair the goat house before commencement of winter season. Because there is a high chance of mortality among kids due to chill weather.

advisory: Continuing harvesting of kharif paddy. Farmers are advised to harvest and process different varieties separately without mixing for better price. Before storing of paddy, it should be dried properly.

Farmers are advised for, not to burn the residue of kharif paddy in the fields because it not only pollutes the environment but also causes severe health (respiratory) problems. Farmers are advised to mix the residue of paddy crop in the soil.
Prevailing weather condition favours the following pest attack. So, recommended control measures should be followed as required.
Pod borer: To control, apply Benfuracarb 40% EC, Deltamethrin 2.8% EC, Spinosad 45% SC or Flubendiamide 39.35% SC mixed with water.
Weed Management: Apply Oxyflourfen 23.5% EC mixed with water. Apply Imazethapyr 10% SL as an early post-emergence herbicide.
Weed Management: Apply Oxadiargyl 6% EC as pre-emergence or Quizalofop-ethyl 5% EC as post-emergence.
Dimond back moth: Spray bio insecticide Azadiractin 0.03% or Beauveria bassiana 5% WP to control.
Tobacco leaf eating caterpillar: Spray Cyantraniliprole 10.26% OD to control.
Dimond back moth: Spray bio insecticide Azadiractin 0.03% or Beauveria bassiana 5% WP to control.
Tobacco leaf eating caterpillar: Spray Cyantraniliprole 10.26% OD to control.
Dimond back moth: Spray bio insecticide Azadiractin 0.03% or Beauveria bassiana 5% WP to control.
Tobacco leaf eating caterpillar: Spray Cyantraniliprole 10.26% OD to control.
To control the vector of YMV and leaf curling due to aphid infestation in okra spray Buprofezin 15% + Acephate 35% WP or Thiamethoxam 25% WG.
To control fruit borer in okra spray neem-based pesticide 1500 ppm or Spinosad 45% SC.
Provide sufficient green grass. Lactating animals should be provided with concentrate mix for better production.
Farmers are advised to repair the goat house before commencement of winter season. Because there is a high chance of mortality among kids due to chill weather.

Make necessary arrangements to provide heat especially to chicks during night hours to reduce the mortality rate. Make proper brooding arrangement for chicks. Keep the poultry house clean and clamp free.
